Class document

java.lang.Object
document
All Implemented Interfaces:
dInterface
public class document extends Object implements dInterface
This Class is used to hold the word data of the User's chosen document file. It also keeps track of the number of words, characters and misspellings

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    document()
    This is an Default Empty Constructor Method that the GUI initially creates an object for
    document​(String nameOfFile)
    This is a Constructor Method that accepts a string file name, reads from the file, adds the text onto both String variable "dcontent" and arrayList "wordList", and increments integer variables "numWords", "numChars" and "numMisspellings"

      public document​(String nameOfFile) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException

      FileNotFoundException
